brd_document.title: Age-Based Video Discovery Platform - Business Requirements Document
brd_document.executive_summary: This Business Requirements Document outlines the development of an innovative mobile application that revolutionizes video content discovery by providing age-specific recommendations of trending videos. The platform addresses a critical market gap where users struggle to find age-appropriate, engaging content amidst the overwhelming volume of online videos. By leveraging advanced data analytics and machine learning algorithms, the application will curate and present the most-watched videos for each age demographic, creating a personalized discovery experience that enhances user satisfaction while ensuring content appropriateness. The solution targets a projected 50,000 users within three months of launch, with anticipated revenue streams from premium subscriptions and targeted advertising, positioning the company as a leader in the personalized content curation space.
brd_document.business_context: The global video streaming market has reached $502 billion in 2024, with users spending an average of 17 hours weekly consuming video content. However, current platforms like YouTube, TikTok, and Netflix employ broad recommendation algorithms that often fail to consider age-appropriateness and demographic preferences. Market research indicates that 73% of parents express concern about their children's video consumption, while 68% of all users report difficulty finding relevant content. Competitors primarily focus on general popularity metrics or basic parental controls, leaving a significant opportunity for a specialized age-based curation platform. Our solution uniquely positions itself by combining real-time viewing data analysis with sophisticated age-group segmentation, creating a defensible market position in the $8.5 billion video recommendation technology sector.
brd_document.problem_statement: Users across all age groups face significant challenges in discovering video content that is both popular within their demographic and age-appropriate, resulting in wasted time, exposure to unsuitable content, and diminished viewing satisfaction, particularly affecting younger audiences and their guardians who lack effective tools for age-specific content discovery.

objectives.description: Launch a fully functional mobile application on iOS and Android platforms by Q3 2024 that accurately recommends top-viewed videos for specific age groups, achieving 50,000 active users within 90 days of launch
success_criteria: Successfully deploy on both iOS App Store and Google Play Store by September 30, 2024
Achieve 50,000 registered users with verified age profiles within 90 days
Maintain 95% accuracy in age-appropriate content recommendations as validated by user feedback
objectives.business_value: Establishes market presence in the personalized content discovery sector, creates foundation for subscription revenue model, and builds valuable user data assets for future monetization opportunities

objectives.description: Achieve sustainable user engagement metrics by December 2024, with average daily sessions exceeding 2.5 per user and maintaining a 4.5+ star rating on app stores
success_criteria: Average 2.5+ daily sessions per active user by December 31, 2024
Maintain minimum 4.5-star rating across iOS and Android app stores
Achieve 40% of users sharing or recommending videos within the app
objectives.business_value: Drives organic growth through user satisfaction, reduces customer acquisition costs, and increases lifetime value per user

objectives.description: Establish revenue generation capabilities by Q1 2025, achieving $100,000 in monthly recurring revenue through premium subscriptions and advertising partnerships
success_criteria: Launch premium subscription tier with 5% conversion rate by January 2025
Secure 10+ advertising partners for age-targeted campaigns
objectives.business_value: Creates sustainable revenue model, validates business viability, and attracts potential investors for Series A funding

in_scope: Native iOS and Android mobile applications with responsive design
Age-based user profiling system with verification mechanisms
Real-time video trending algorithm analyzing viewing patterns by age group
Content curation engine integrating APIs from major video platforms
Parental control features for users under 18
Personalized recommendation feed with daily updates
Basic analytics dashboard for content performance tracking
Multi-language support for English, Spanish, and Mandarin
out_of_scope: Original video content creation or hosting
Social networking features or user-to-user messaging

constraints: Initial development budget limited to $500,000 for MVP launch
Must comply with COPPA regulations for users under 13 years old
Development timeline cannot exceed 9 months due to market competition
Limited to 10 engineering resources for initial development phase
Must maintain GDPR and CCPA compliance for data privacy
API rate limits from third-party video platforms may restrict data collection
assumptions: Major video platforms (YouTube, TikTok, Vimeo) will maintain accessible APIs for content metadata retrieval
Users will provide accurate age information during registration with 90% compliance rate
Sufficient viewing data exists across all age demographics to generate meaningful recommendations
Mobile app stores will approve the application without significant content restrictions
Target audience has consistent internet connectivity for streaming video content
Parents will actively engage with parental control features for minor accounts

risks.description: Video platform APIs may change or restrict access, disrupting content aggregation capabilities
risks.mitigation: Develop redundant data sources, establish partnership agreements with platforms, and maintain fallback scraping mechanisms

risks.description: Inaccurate age verification leading to inappropriate content recommendations and potential legal liability
risks.mitigation: Implement multi-factor age verification, machine learning content filters, and human moderation team for sensitive age groups

risks.description: Insufficient user adoption due to market saturation or ineffective marketing
risks.mitigation: Conduct extensive market research, implement referral programs, partner with parenting influencers, and offer freemium model

risks.description: Data privacy breach resulting in user information exposure and regulatory penalties
risks.mitigation: Implement enterprise-grade security protocols, conduct regular security audits, maintain cyber insurance, and establish incident response team

risks.description: Algorithm bias leading to poor recommendations for certain age groups or demographics
risks.mitigation: Implement diverse training data sets, conduct regular algorithm audits, and maintain feedback loops for continuous improvement

prd_document.product_vision: Create the definitive mobile platform for discovering age-specific viral video content, bridging generational gaps through shared media experiences and fostering cross-generational understanding.
target_audience: Parents seeking age-appropriate content for children aged 2-17
Young adults (18-35) interested in generational trends and nostalgia
Content creators and marketers analyzing viral trends across demographics
Educators using multimedia for age-specific curriculum enhancement
prd_document.value_proposition: AgePlay instantly reveals the most popular videos for any age group throughout history, enabling users to discover, share, and understand generational content trends while ensuring age-appropriate viewing experiences.

Content filtering blocks inappropriate material based on age rating

technical_requirements.description: Microservices architecture with separate services for content delivery, user management, and analytics
Distributed database system for video metadata and user preferences with real-time sync
constraints: Data residency compliance for EU users

technical_requirements.description: API integrations with major video platforms for content aggregation and playback
CDN and edge computing for global content delivery with low latency
AI/ML pipeline for content moderation and recommendation engine

prd_document.architecture_overview: Cloud-native microservices architecture deployed on AWS with React Native mobile clients. Core services include Discovery Engine (age-video matching), Content Safety Service (moderation), User Service (authentication/preferences), and Analytics Service. ElasticSearch powers search, DynamoDB stores user data, and Redis handles caching. CloudFront CDN ensures global low-latency delivery.
